content: --उक्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {1} a figure of speech in which what is apparently the effect of one cause is intentionally ascribed to another; in other words, where a feeling is dissembled by being attributed to a different cause; see <ls>K. P. 10</ls> under व्याजोक्ति. {2} covert allusion, insinuation.
